testcase.name: Signup successfully with valid data and validate the email and send to valid id
testcase.system-out: Given I should be on the Screen with signup.................................passed When I click on Signup button...............................................passed And I Enter First name as "Nidhi1"..........................................passed And I Enter Last name as "Nidhi1"...........................................passed And I Enter e-mail as "nidhi1@nidhi1.com"...................................passed And I Enter Username as "ndhingra1".........................................passed And I Enter Pass as "abcd"..................................................passed And I Enter Confirm Pass as "abcd"..........................................passed And I click on Register button..............................................passed And I click on the picture button...........................................passed And I click on the inbox button.............................................passed And I click on the compose button...........................................passed And I click on sendto as "nidhi1@nidhi1.com"................................passed And I enter the subject as "Hi".............................................passed And I click on the Send Message button......................................passed Then I should see the acknowledgement window as "The message has been sent to Nidhi1 Nidhi1 (ndhingra1)".passed
